raw: Greeks return to beaches in heatwave, but keep umbrellas apart .
replaced: Greeks return to beaches in heatwave, but keep umbrellas apart .

raw: ATHENS ( Reuters ) - Greeks flocked to the seaside on Saturday when more than 500 beaches reopened , as the country sought to walk the fine line between protecting people from COVID-19 while reviving the tourism sector that many depend on for their livelihoods .
replaced: ATHENS ( Reuters ) - Greeks flocked to the seaside on Saturday when more than 500 beaches reopened , as the country sought to walk the fine line between protecting people from COVID-19 while reviving the tourism sector that many depend on for many livelihoods .

raw: People enjoy the sun during the official reopening of beaches to the public following the easing of measures against the spread of the coronavirus disease ( COVID-19 ) , in Athens , Greece , May 16 , 2020 .
replaced: People enjoy the sun during the official reopening of beaches to the public following the easing of measures against the spread of the coronavirus disease ( COVID-19 ) , in Athens  Greece , May 16 , 2020 .

raw: For many in Greece , it was a first foray into a big public venue since the country began easing its lockdown earlier this month , and it also coincided with the first heatwave of the year .
replaced: For many in Greece , it was a first foray into a big public venue since the country began easing the country  the lockdown that had been in place since mid - March earlier this month , and it also coincided with the first heatwave of this year .

raw: Sun - seekers were required to respect distancing rules , which even stipulated how far umbrellas must be kept apart .
replaced: Sun - seekers were required to respect distancing rules , which even stipulated how far umbrellas must be kept apart .

raw: No more than 40 people were allowed per 1,000 square metres ( 10,750 sq ft ) , while umbrella poles had to be four metres ( 13 ft ) apart , with canopies no closer than one metre , according to a government - issued manual , complete with diagram .
replaced: No more than 40 people were allowed per 1,000 square metres ( 10,750 sq ft ) , while umbrella poles had to be four metres ( 13 ft ) apart , with canopies no closer than one metre , according to a government - issued manual , complete with diagram .

raw: At Alimos , a popular beach just south of Athens , people queued up from the early morning to nab their spot in the sunshine .
replaced: At Alimos  Athens , people queued up from the early morning to nab people spot in the sunshine .

raw: “ This is the best thing for us elderly ... to come and relax a bit after being locked in , ” Yannis Tentomas , who is in his 70s , said as he settled down under an umbrella .

raw: The lifting of the lockdown comes as countries around Europe and the world look to ease restrictions imposed to curb the pandemic , in an attempt to resurrect their economies .

raw: From May 4 , it began a phased - in easing of the lockdown that had been in place since mid - March .

raw: The country of 11 million people is one of the most dependent in Europe on tourism , which generates about a fifth of its economic output .

raw: Greece ’s lockdown , plus the shutdown of much of the world , and most air travel , is likely to have a profound effect on a country only just starting to recover from a decade of financial turmoil and austerity .
